casebody.data:
STODART v. MUTUAL FILM CORD, et al. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. February 13, 1918.) No. 143. Appeal from the District Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York. Bill by Robert Stodart against the Mutual Film Corporation and the American Film Company, Incorporated. From a decree for complainant, defendants appeal. Affirmed. For opinion below, see 249 Fed. 507. Elijah N. Zoline, of New York City, and James P. Grier, of Chicago, 111., for appellants. Paul N. Turner, of New York City, for appellee.

Before WARD, ROGERS, and HOUGH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
